properties.name: a4sync.chunks.max-size
properties.description: Maximum size of mod chunks in bytes

properties.name: a4sync.chunks.min-free-space
properties.description: Minimum free space required on disk for new uploads

properties.name: a4sync.rate-limit.capacity
properties.description: Maximum number of tokens in the rate limit bucket

properties.name: a4sync.repository.config-file
properties.description: Path to the repository configuration file

properties.name: a4sync.chunks.temp-directory
properties.description: Directory for temporary chunk storage during uploads

properties.name: a4sync.rate-limit.per-ip
properties.description: Apply rate limiting per IP address instead of globally

properties.name: a4sync.root-directory
properties.description: Root directory where all repository files are stored

properties.name: a4sync.chunks.parallel
properties.description: The number of parallel chunk uploads allowed per stream

properties.name: a4sync.chunks.validate-hashes
properties.description: Whether to validate chunk hashes on upload

properties.name: a4sync.rate-limit.refill-rate
properties.description: The number of tokens to add to the bucket per second

properties.name: a4sync.discord.enabled
properties.description: Enable Discord integration and provide the bot token
